Class AbstractClientAvatar

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scs.stevetech1.entities.Entity

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jme3.export.Savable, ISimpleEntity<PhysicalEntity>, IAffectedByPhysics, ICanShoot, IDontCollideWithComrades, IEntity, IKillable, IPhysicalEntity, IPlayerControlled, IProcessByClient, IProcessByServer, IShowOnHUD

    public abstract class AbstractClientAvatar
extends AbstractAvatar
implements IShowOnHUD, IProcessByClient, IKillable
    This is the superclass for the client-side players avatar.
